summary: When a prosecutor leaks a false story that a liquor warehouse owner is involved in the murder of a union head, the man's life begins to unravel.
cast: Paul Newman|Sally Field|Bob Balaban|Melinda Dillon|Luther Adler|Barry Primus|Josef Sommer|John Harkins|Don Hood|Wilford Brimley|Arnie Ross|Phanie Napoli|Shelley Spurlock|Shawn McAllister|Joe Petrullo|William Kerwin|Oswaldo Calvo|Clardy Malugen|Sharon Anderson|Jody Wilson|Ilse Earl|Alfredo Álvarez Calderón|Pat Sullivan|Bill Hindman|John Archie|Timothy Hawkins|Ricardo Márquez|Patricia Matzdorff|Diane Zolten|Kathy Suergiu|Jeff Gillen|Ted Bartsch|Sugar Ray Mann|Richard O'Barry|Chuck Lupo|John DiSanti|Laurie V. keywords: murder|reference to the john f. kennedy assassination|coffee|newspaper|mafia
title: Ausencia de malicia
